@soumith @colesbury I can send a PR for this if no one is working on it? 

Currently `BCELoss` assumes a sigmoid is applied before this layer, so do we want to add a new layer all together for the more stable version that combine `sigmoid` + `BCELoss`? If so, any suggestions for a name?
